nodes.text: Imperial High Command, also known as Imperial Central Command or simply Imperial Command, was the agency responsible for coordinating the war effort of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. It presumably had ties to the Imperial Security Bureau and Imperial Intelligence agencies. Naval Command, Army Command, Stormtrooper Command, and Battle Station Command were below it.
By 11 ABY, General Redd Wessel was the leader of the Imperial Central Command.
